sub_title: Senior Turbomachinery Engineer at GE Oil & Gas
summary:
- Resourceful, self-motivated and detail-driven project team leader with over 35 years of experience in the Oil & Gas Industry gained on Upstream, Refinery and Petrochemical Engineering and Construction projects. Strong expertise in Static and Rotating equipment design, fabrication, installation, pre-commissioning, commissioning, plant start-up, maintenance and turnarounds. 
 - Project team leader with extensive expertise in Conceptual, Basic, Front End and Detailed Engineering Design, EPC, EPCC, LSTK projects, with specific experience on several Refinery and Petrochemical Units including: Gas/Oil Separation, LNG/NGL Recovery, Oil Desalting and Stabilization, Atmospheric and Vacuum Distillation, Fluid Catalytic Cracking, Hydro-Cracking, Catalytic Reforming, Isomerization, Hydro-treating (Naphtha, Diesel, Kerosene), Delayed Coker, Sulphur Recovery, Naphtha Ethylene Crackers, Ethylene Production, Air Separation Units, etc.
 - Key Skills:
Environmental and Safety Improvement Initiatives ♦ Front End and Detailed Engineering Design ♦ Project WBS, Planning, Scheduling and Execution ♦ Strategic and Tactical Project Planning ♦ Tendering / Designing ♦ Budget Estimation and Implementation and Project Cost Control ♦Time Management and Multiple Task Prioritization ♦ Risk Assessment and Risk Management ♦ Quality Assurance and Audit performance ♦ Process and Performance Improvements ♦ Customer, Vendor and Stakeholders Satisfaction.
 - In-depht engineering expertise with a variety of rotating equipment such as: ♦Steam Turbines (Elliott, Dresser-Rand, Coppus, Terry, Siemens, Hitachi) ♦ Gas Turbines (Hyundai H-25GT, GE-NP Frame6, Tumanski R13-300, RollsRoyce RB211-535E4) ♦ Turbo-expanders (Atlas-Copco, GE-NP, Hyundai, Cryostar) ♦ Reciprocating Compressor (GE-NP, Thomassen, Ingersoll Rand, NEA, Burkhardt, Hoerbriger) ♦ Centrifugal Compressor (GE-NP, Ingersoll Rand, MAN, Hitachi, Ariel, etc.) ♦ Multistage process pump (Sulzer, Flowserve, KSB, Ingersoll Rand, Weir-Gabbionetta.

education.field_of_study: Reliability and Risk Analysis, full time

profile_positions.description:
1. Inspect and analyse all the GE rotating equipment installed on site.
2. Assist the fully dismantle of the gas compressors, steam turbines, turbo-expanders, during major overhauls, and looking for damaged parts.
3. Preparing the inspection reports and recommendation reports regarding necessary spare parts.
4. Assist the start-up of the machinery after major overhauls.
5. Improve the overall performance of the turbomachinery.
6. Managing a group of engineers and technicians during turnaround or major overhauls in order to execute all the necessary maintenance operation according with the schedule.
7. Responding to breakdowns, evaluate and diagnose the machinery faults, find the best repair solutions and assist repairing activities related to critical equipment.
8. Offering technical expertise to the engineers, supervisors and technicians during maintenance activities related to the rotating equipment on site.
